member.desc: ISC-BPR2 Blue Line Gen2 PIR Motion Detectors

optional.desc: Additional Motion Detectors, Pet Sensitive Detectors

spec.name: ISC-BPR2  Blue Line Gen2 PIR Motion Detectors

members.name: Pet Immunity1
members.details: One or two pets up to 20 kg (45 lb) or numerous rodents.

members.name: Relative Humidity
members.details: 0 to 95%, non-condensingFor UL Listed product installations, 0 to 85%, non-condensing

members.name: Temperature (operating)
members.details: -30°C to +55°C (-20°F to +130°F)For UL Listed product installations, 0°C to +49°C (+32°F to +120°F)

members.name: Dimensions
members.details: 105 mm x 61 mm x 44  mm (4.2 in. x 2.4 in. x 1.7 in.)

members.name: Radio Frequency Interference (RFI) Immunity
members.details: No alarm or setup on critical frequencies in the range from 150 kHz to 2 GHz at field strengths less than 30 V/m.

members.name: Relay
members.details: Solid state, supervised, Form A normally-closed (NC) contacts rated for ≤100 mA, 25 VDC, 2.5 W, <20 Ω closed
